venue.address_1: rt 93, rt 3, spit brook and DW
venue.name: OverPasses/Barnes and Noble

item.description:
Signs and banners will wave:
see JB's plan below for overpasses.
For Barnes and Noble, South Nashua 4:30 PM RSVP not necessary.
-------------------------------------------------
JB's plan for overpasses:

Manchester area overpasses 4:30pm - 6:30/7:00pm
Nashua/Merrimack area overpasses 5:30pm - 7:00pm
Times are also flexible depending on your
availability.

We will be waving the Google Ron Paul and Ron Paul
Revolution banners at various overpasses on Everett
Turnpike, 293, and 93 during Friday rush hour traffic.
There will be two people per overpass for as many
overpasses as we can manage. People will be teamed up
based on what locations are convenient for you and
what time you can start waving.

If you're interested, email me (Joseph) at
phoebaca@yahoo.com and provide the following
information:

1. What area (highway and exit #) is most convenient
for you to get to.
2. What is the earliest time you can start waving.

Once I have a list of all participants, I will pair
people up, assign them an overpass, provide banners,
and help people pick a meeting spot. I will post and
email all details and "assignments" by Thursday
evening.
item.name: wave your signs and/or banners
